Package gui

Title: gui
The following package holds all classes related to the User Interface (UI) of the Binary Puzzle Assistant (BPA).

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MainFrame
    The mainframe of the BPA.
    PuzzlePanel
    The panel of the puzzle

Package gui Description

Title: gui
The following package holds all classes related to the User Interface (UI) of the Binary Puzzle Assistant (BPA). The MainFrame is the main frame of said UI, which has a PuzzlePanel inside, which holds the current grid related to the view's information. Clas(ses) involved:
  • MainFrame
  • PuzzlePanel
Functionality:
  • A MainFrame class is the main frame of the GUI and manages GUI events. It contains a PuzzlePanel. It provides the following functionality:
    • Method(s) for handling GUI events
      Specification (done), Test cases (done), Implementation (done)
    • Method(s) for interaction with the controllers
      Specification (done), Test cases (done), Implementation (done)
  • A PuzzlePanel class that manages the currently active grid. It provides the following functionality:
    • Method(s) to draw the currently active grid
      Specification (done), Test cases (done), Implementation (done)
    • Method(s) to query cells from the active grid
      Specification (done), Test cases (done), Implementation (done)
